INSERT INTO ORDER_TBL (ODR_CODE, MEM_ID, ODR_NAME, ODR_ZIPCODE, ODR_ADDR, ODR_ADDR_D, ODR_PHONE, ODR_TOTAL_PRICE) VALUES (#{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{odr_name}, #{odr_zipcode}, #{odr_addr}, #{odr_addr_d}, #{odr_phone}, #{odr_total_price})

INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL_TBL (ODR_CODE, PDT_NUM, ODR_AMOUNT, ODR_PRICE) SELECT #{odr_code}, C.PDT_NUM, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PDT_PRICE * C.CART_AMOUNT FROM CART_TBL C INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TBL P ON C.PDT_NUM = P.PDT_NUM WHERE C.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_TBL (PAY_CODE, ODR_CODE, MEM_ID, PAY_METHOD, PAY_TOT_PRICE) VALUES (SEQ_PAYMENT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{pay_method}, #{pay_tot_price})
